    Writing Policy Files

Function reference

Gradescope Data Functions

These functions are to validate and process the Gradescope data.

Validate Gradescope Data

read_gs()
Read Gradescope .csv
check_data_format()
Check Formatting of Gradescope Data
get_id_cols()
Get the ID Columns for Gradescope Data
get_assignments()
Get the Assignment Names for Gradescope Data
drop_ungraded_assignments()
Drop Ungraded Assignments

Process Gradescope Data

process_gs()
Process Gradescope Data
process_id()
Process Student IDs
get_duplicate_ids()
Get Duplicate Student IDs
pivot_gs()
Convert GS data to longer table

Policy File Functions

These functions are to validate and process the policy file.

flatten_policy()
Reshape policy file from nested to flat
validate_policy()
Validate Policy File

Grading Functions

These functions are to grade the processed Gradescope data based on the criteria in the processed policy file

get_grades()
Calculate Grades This function calculates all grades based on the policy file.
get_category_grade()
Calculate Single Category Grade This function calculates all grades based on the policy file.
score() aggregation() lateness() drop_n_lowest() aggregation_max_pts() aggregation_lateness()
Key Functions
raw_over_max()
Score Functions
equally_weighted() weighted_by_points() max_score() min_score() weighted_mean() none()
Aggregation Functions
sum_max_pts() mean_max_pts()
Aggregation for Max Points Functions
until() add() between() scale_by() after() set_to()
Lateness Functions
mean_lateness() sum_lateness() max_lateness()
Aggregation for Lateness Functions

Demo Items

These items are used to demonstrate the functionality of this package.

gs_demo
Gradescope Demo Data
simple_policy
Simple Policy Demo File
